course.title: MAT 5185 Asymptotic Methods of Applied Mathematics (3 units)
course.desc: Asymptotic series: properties, matching, application to linear and nonlinear differential equations. Asymptotic expansion of integrals: elementary methods, methods of Laplace, Stationary Phase and Steepest Descent, Watson's Lemma, Riemann-Lebesgue Lemma. Perturbation methods: regular and singular perturbation for differential equations, multiple scale analysis, boundary layer theory, WKB theory. This course is equivalent to MATH 5408 at Carleton University.Course Component: Lecture
